item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Aren't you a great daughter Anita! :D Love how perfect the arrangement of strawberries is too! very clever freezing a single portion of it. I bet it would taste similar to ice cream :)

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: Hi Anita, your trifle looks sensational - what a lucky treat your mom had for her birthday. And definitely, anything with a macaron on top makes it even more special.
item.content:encoded: Hi Anita, your trifle looks sensational – what a lucky treat your mom had for her birthday. And definitely, anything with a macaron on top makes it even more special.

item.title: By: Linda V
item.dc:creator: Linda V
item.description: This is the prettiest trifle. I don't love trifle at all but I think I would be tempted by this one.
item.content:encoded: This is the prettiest trifle. I don’t love trifle at all but I think I would be tempted by this one.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Wow, that trifle has metamorphosed into something truly stylish!
item.content:encoded: Wow, that trifle has metamorphosed into something truly stylish!

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: I am a very lucky Mum to have such a wonderful daughter who makes me such delicious desserts!! It was a beautiful trifle and as well as having the individual one I also had a serving from the large bowl. I do like trifle!!! Thanks again Anita, I can't wait for my next birthday!
item.content:encoded: I am a very lucky Mum to have such a wonderful daughter who makes me such delicious desserts!! It was a beautiful trifle and as well as having the individual one I also had a serving from the large bowl. I do like trifle!!! Thanks again Anita, I can’t wait for my next birthday!
